message:
大家好！

Creative Commons Summit 2015 於 10 月 14-17 日在韓國首爾舉行。

提案截止日期原為 7/17 現已展延到 7/22：

> https://summit.creativecommons.org/cfp/

摘錄如下：

The Creative Commons Global Summit takes place every two years bringing together our global affiliate network along with partners, activists, and collaborators in the open movement to celebrate and advance the Commons. We're pleased to announce the call for participation and proposals for this year's Global Summit in Seoul, South Korea, October 15-17 2015, is now open.

Proposals for talks, workshops, hackathons, panels, presentations, performances, showcases and other activities are welcome.

Proposals that involve collaboration with local communities, public offices, or businesses and organizations not directly part of the Creative Commons community are welcome and encouraged.

Those who submit proposals will be given priority for scholarships to attend the Summit, although scholarships cannot be guaranteed.

g0v 在開放資料、開放政府、以及開放內容的各項工作，我想 Creative Commons Summit 的與會者應該會感到高度興趣。

有請大家踴躍提案！ :-)
story: Tyng-Ruey Chuang shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.

data.message: 不妨 子龍 和 Jimy Huang 開頭的把這個做完順便投稿？ http://g0v.github.io/cchelper/

咦？這個坑文案改了！雖然之前沒有人回應 hackpad 意見 :p
